argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rngcl.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_rngmgp | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. SGrp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_sgrpmgm | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. SGrp -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mgm ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Rng -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mgm ) |
| 7 | 3, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 2 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .x. = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mgmcl | |- ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mgm /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( R e. Rng /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) |
